Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“Please don’t try to cook on them. Sure, Specialist Verin calls it her walking Barbeque Grill, but just bumping them causes a fiery blowback of third-degree burns. They’re like walking napalm grenades. Plasmoids became available when research scientists from the Promethean project developed what they called a Phoenix Op Station. There’s a whole protocol to containing the caustic inferno of chemicals that fuel them. Ever since then, these little fiery bots are part of our acquisition cycle. We can order a little extra fire-power, if you catch my meaning.”—Tex ‘Melonballer’ Smith, “RV-6750M: Special Ops and Support”

“请不要在用它来做菜。虽然，维林专家称呼它为移动的烧烤架，但只是碰了一下它们便受到了三级烧伤。它们更像是行走的凝固汽油弹。当圣火计划的科研人员开发出了凤凰行动站后，等离子粒团也随之被开发了出来。为了容纳具有腐蚀性的化学燃料，他们设计出了一整套方案。自那之后，这些小型的易怒机器人便成为了我们采集循环的一部分，我们也因此获得了一些额外的火力支援，如果你明白我的意思的话。”- 泰克斯“挖球者”史密斯，“RV-6750M：特殊行动和支援”

“Rumors of Xenoplague brought the Prometheans. They dutifully set the whole countryside ablaze. Encircled by walls of flame, I led Tarrex-IIV’s terrified colonists to an Aegis Tank. My advice in case of a Promethean-caused Inferno: Find an Aegis Tank. Resistant to fire and capable of manipulating its Fallout Shield Dome, we felt cool relief as its protective field encompassed us. Using its kinetic force projector, the tank cleared away obstacles, creating a safe perimeter away from the blaze. Good to know, if they burn down the planet, at least they provide shelter from the firestorm.”—Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-3999X: Vacation Hotspots”

“有传言称是异星疫病导致了圣火使者的到来，他们尽职尽责地将整个郊外烧得精光。被火焰包围的时候，我带领着塔里克斯-IIV 号星球上被吓坏了的移住民们乘上了一辆神盾坦克。应对圣火使者的烈焰，我的建议是：找到一辆神盾坦克。它不仅防火，而且还能放出辐射护盾穹顶。当被保护的力场包围时，我们感觉非常安全。我们用坦克的动能发射器清理路上的障碍物，安全地离开了着火地带。至少现在我们知道，如果他们把整个星球都点燃了，神盾坦克是安全的避难所。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-3999X：假期热点”

“He towers over the flames like a proud father, leading his hungry ethereal offspring to spread across worlds, consuming all. The armored giant extends its arm and a stream of blinding plasma cuts through any stone or steel. All solids melt. Liquids evaporate. The Phoenix Walker extends its leaden wings in a blistering torrent of flame. There is no safe approach to this glaring god of fire that greets its devotees with gouts of PyrX Firestorm. All life blackens and bows, ascending before this chaos titan like a prayer of ashen worship.”—Arsonist Poet Xin’xia Xiq, “RV-6651R: Promethean Prayers”

“他行走在火焰之中，像一名骄傲的父亲带领着饥饿的虚灵后代，前往各个星球吞噬一切。装甲巨人伸展手臂，炫目的等离子流便能切开任何石头或钢铁。固体都将会熔化，液体将会蒸发。凤凰行者在炙热的火焰中展开自己铅灰色的翅膀。当这位光芒万丈的火焰之神用派尔克斯火焰风暴向自己的信徒表达问候时，没有任何方法能够安全地靠近他。当这位象征着混沌的巨人吟诵着自己对灰烬的崇拜时，周围的所有生灵都化为了灰烬。”- 纵火诗人辛夏奇，“RV-6651R：圣火祷告者”

“Fire is hypnotic. I don’t believe in magic; but if I did, it’d live in fire. I joined the Prometheans at the height of hysteria when the Xenoplague was discovered. At the time, I was thinking, why should robots have all the fun of dispensing incendiary accelerants? I never bought into the dogma that as a Purifier I brought holy fire. There’s something about oxidizing even the heartiest biohazards. I’ll admit it. I love watching noxious lifeforms dispersed in a puff of fumes. Burn them all. Reduced to smoke. Now that’s purity.”—Promethean Specialist Verin, “RV-6750M: Special Ops and Support”

“火焰是催眠药。我不相信魔法，就算是有，魔法也应该生活在火焰里。当外星疫病首次被发现时，我满怀热血地加入了圣火修会。那时我在想，为什么只有机器人能够享受使用助燃剂的快乐？在身为圣火净化者的那段时光里，我从没有遵守过教条。即使是最活跃的生物危害也存在着氧化。我必须承认，我喜欢看着污秽的生命体在火焰中消逝的样子。烧光它们，将它们化为青烟，这才叫纯净。”- 圣火专家维林，“RV-6750M：特殊行动和支援”
